job title: Postdoctoral Research Associate or Research Scientist - Biomedical Engineering - St.
job description:
Job Type/Schedule

This position is full-time and works approximately 37.5 hours per week.

Department Name/Job Location

This position is in the Department of Biomedical Engineering. The position is located at Whitaker Hall. This position is for the Danforth Campus in the School of Engineering and Applied Science.

Essential Functions

An individual is sought to participate in the development and application of advanced machine learning methods for medical imaging applications. Of particular interest is the development of deep learning methods for interpretation of large volumetric medical images. The ideal candidate will have experience in machine learning, computed imaging, and scientific programming.

Required Qualifications

Ph.D. in biomedical engineering, computer science, or related field.

Salary Range

The hiring range for this position is commensurate with experience.

Benefits

This position is eligible for full-time benefits. Please visit our website at http://hr.wustl.edu to view a summary of benefits.

Applicant Special Instructions

Applicants should provide with their application a letter of interest outlining how their work experience applies to the position. The cover letter should be included as the first page of the cv upload.

EOE Statement
